name: Bastion (itch)
description:
Bastion is a 2D tower defense game. You command a legion of medieval warriors to fight off an endless horde of corrupted enemies. Units are split into 5 unique classes and a new unit is unlocked every level.

Controls

  • Select unit = W/S or Scroll Wheel.
  • Place unit = Left Click
  • Delete unit = Left Shift + Left Click

This is my second game I've worked on to completion.
